nodes.text: A professor taught at the Chiss Academy in the Unknown Regions. Prior to the beginning of the Clone Wars in 22 BBY, the professor challenged a young Chiss student named Sev'rance Tann to train a group of creatures called the Yresilini, believed to be untrainable, into an army. Tann succeeded in her assignment by intimidating the Yresilini with the fear of death as a punishment for disobedience, and the professor gave high marks for her performance.
The professor was mentioned in Sev'rance Tann's databank entry in the 2002 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds: Clone Campaigns.
